products.h2: Power Up with the Right Supplements
products.p: Need more energy, faster recovery, or better results? Our premium supplements are here to help you level up—inside and out.

exercises.p1: At Fitness Partner, we make it easy to stay active no matter where you are or what equipment you have. From quick warm-ups to full gym sessions, we’ve got expert-approved exercises tailored for your goals — and some

machine.p1: Don't worry! Upload a photo of it and we will identify it for you!
machine.p2: Upload a jpg photo of the gym machine to identify it.

nutrition.h2: Smart Nutrition for a Stronger You

choose.p1: At Fitness Partner, we believe that good nutrition is the foundation of real progress. That's why we offer smart, easy-to-use tools to help you understand your body, choose the right foods, and plan your meals like a pro — with a little help from AI magic
choose.p2: Here's how we support your journey:

card1.p: Understand where you stand and where you're headed. Use our Body Fat Calculator to get a clear picture of your current body composition — and track your progress over time

card2.p: Curious about the calories, fats, proteins, and nutrients in your favorite foods? With Know Your Food, just search any item — like apples,chicken, or oats — and instantly see detailed nutrition facts to make smarter choices.

card3.p: Take the stress out of eating right. Choose from carefully designed meal plans — whether your goal is fat loss, muscle gain, or better health — or let our AI build a customized meal plan based on your personal data, InBody results, and goals

fatCalculator.invalid1: Age is required and must be a valid number

fatCalculator.invalid3: Height is required and must be a valid number

food.p1: Track your calories, protein, fat, and carbs easily!

mealsPlanner.label: Select Your Goal:
mealsPlanner.alert: Please select a goal above to view your custom meal plan.

about.p1: Your Fitness Journey, Smarter and Stronger with Fitness Partner
about.p2: We believe fitness should be simple, smart, and personal. That's why we've built a platform that does more than just offer products, We become your true partner in health and fitness.
about.p3: Our smart AI system helps you find the perfect nutrition plan based on your InBody analysis, your personal goals, and your entered data. Whether you're aiming to lose weight, build muscle, or improve overall health, our AI tailors the best path for you—no guesswork, just results.
about.p4: Fuel your body with only the best. We offer carefully selected supplements to boost your energy, recovery, and performance, so you can train harder and feel better every day.
about.p5: Looking for expert support? Browse and connect with certified personal trainers who understand your journey and are ready to create customized training plans just for you.
about.p6: From beginner to advanced, from home workouts to full gym programs—we provide a wide range of exercises to keep you moving toward your goals.
about.p7: Eating right has never been easier. Get access to easy, practical nutrition tips and meal ideas that match your plan and fuel your progress.

favs.p: Save your favorite products to see them here!
